"Hans":
"With you involved,
it makes no difference whether
there's one, two, or three horns!"

"But me? I haven't seen a horn yet that
doesn’t make me run! Maybe I'm in
the wrong line of work."

"But enough about me. I can't wait 'til you
get back so I can pick your brain about this!"

"おたくにかかれば
角が１本でも２本でも３本でも
全然関係なさそうだな！"

"そこへいくとオレなんか
どうしても角から逃げることばっかり
考えちゃうもんなぁ……"

"まあオレの話はいいや。
帰りを待ってるよ。"
